participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and nurturing, enjoys simple pleasures in life.
participant_1.background: I won a bowling tournament last year, and my CD collection is still safe. My favorite thing to do is watch TV and admire beautiful flowers. I'm just trying to live my life and be myself, and I enjoy country music, tattoos, and iced tea. I've found that reading to my baby is a great way to bond with her and help her learn new things. I am an American who enjoys the culture of my neighbors.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and creative, with a passion for music and cars.
participant_2.background: I get lost in my music or tinkering with my car. My girlfriend lives in the condo next door. I won a beauty pageant one time but did not feel like it was worth the effort. I've started bringing a snack to work so I'm not starving by the time my students arrive. I'm looking for a job.

content.text: I'm doing great, thanks for asking! How about yourself?
I'm doing well, thanks! I'm just relaxing at home today.
That sounds nice. I'm at work, but I'm getting ready to head home soon.
What do you do for work?
Oh, that's cool! I've always thought about being a teacher.
It's a great job! I love working with kids.
I bet. I'm sure you have a lot of fun with them.
Yeah, I do. They're always so excited to learn new things.
That's great. Do you have any kids of your own?
Oh, that's so cute! What's her name?
Well, it was nice talking to you. I hope you have a great day at work.
